item.title: Theorem of the Month: Euler's Formula
item.author: ambiverb@gmail.com (Siddharth Nair)
item.description: Perhaps one of the most beautiful equations in mathematics, $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$, connecting five fundamental constants using Euler’s identity.
